Grade 6, 12 graduates in Makati to get cash incentives tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735766 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/735766/grade-6-12-graduates-in-makati-to-get-cash-incentives/story/ Makati City Mayor Abby Binay on Monday said Grade 6 and 12 students who were supposed to graduate this year would receive cash incentives from the local government. In an interview on Super Radyo dzBB, Binay said each student would receive P1,000. Mon, 27 Apr 2020 17:03:17 +0800
